item.title: Frontline Crisis: Demo
item.description:
Title: Frontline Crisis
Genre: Strategy
Developer: BCQT
Publisher: BCQT
Release Date: Aug 14, 2024




About This Game




While I am a loyal RTS gamer, I feel that the genre’s complexity puts many players off. That's why I've always wanted to create my own grand battlefield in a simplified manner, making it more accessible to potential players and RTS fans. In this stylistic pixel game, players will have access to a variety of buildings that synergize with each other and face an array of twisted insectoids.



This game encourages players to experiment with the variety of buildings while challenging their ability to manage resources and plan in advance. Aside from simply firing at the enemy, players must also plan their walking and building routes wisely if they wish to win. Suffice it to say, this game demands critical thinking and quick reaction times, rather than being a one-and-done experience.



The enemies in the game are roughly divided into three categories: flying, land, and burrowing, with bosses being the core challenge of each level. Bosses are not just larger enemies; they have unique quirks and attack patterns, ensuring that players are always thinking on their feet.



This is not a Roguelike, as endless levels only make up a small portion of the game. Rather, the main focus of the game lies with its campaign. With each level you complete, you unlock more buildings, which opens up more possibilities for builds to combat more formidable foes. Read the in-game database to further understand the enemy and develop your battle tactics.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: win 7/8/10/11
    • Processor: 2.0GHz
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 500 MB available space
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

item.title: Rogue Tanks Demo
item.description:
Title: Rogue Tanks
Genre: Action
Developer: Clayton Games
Publisher: Clayton Games
Release Date: Q4 2024




About This Game

Rogue Tanks is a top-down roguelike tank combat game with support for up to 4 players.

Co-op Campaign

Defeat every enemy in 20 randomly selected rooms from a list of 40 hand-crafted levels. After defeating every enemy in a room, choose an upgrade to make your tank faster and stronger. Supports 1 to 4 players locally. Defeat special bosses like the 4-directional, lob-shot, and homing missile tanks to unlock them to play as. Clear special challenge rooms and complete other missions in each run of the game.

Upgrade your tank

increase move speed
increase bullet speed
decrease reload time
add bounce to your shots
reinforce your tank armor
raise your bullet capacity
in co-op mode, choose to revive a fallen ally instead of gaining an upgrade

Versus Mode

Battle your friends in 4-player versus mode. Choose from the tanks you've unlocked and fight on any of the battlefields you've found in the campaign mode, plus some extras. Customize the matches, giving an upgrade to the winner, loser(s), or everyone to make the next match more interesting.

Clear Missions and Set Records

A mission list (achievements list) is provided for an extra challenge. Try beating the campaign with special conditions, like using a specific tank or never choosing a specific upgrade. Records of your best campaign time, shots, and damage taken are saved to your records for each tank type. In co-op, each player can go for different missions, making getting all of them much faster and easier. Records for versus mode are also included.

Full Game Features

  • 40 total levels for the campaign and versus modes
  • 4 different tanks that each fires differently
  • 4 different environments: desert, forest, metal, and space
  • change your tank to any one of 12 different colors
  • play the campaign or versus mode with up to 4 players locally
  • turn on/off friendly fire to force more or less cooperation
  • turn on/off timer to practice speedrunning
  • saves various records and statistics for each tank type
  • 27 special condition missions to complete


Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8400 CPU @ 2.80GHz 2.81 GHz
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics
    • Storage: 40 MB available space

item.title: The Crush House
item.description:
Title: The Crush House
Genre: Adventure , Simulation
Developer: Nerial
Publisher: Devolver Digital
Franchise: Nerial , Devolver Digital
Release Date: Aug 9, 2024




About This Game

Jae has scored the gig of her dreams as the producer on 1999’s hottest reality TV show, The Crush House! The demands are high and the stakes higher as she must cast, film, and produce each season. Play as Jae as you capture the budding romances and explosive drama of each unique season in the iconic Malibu mansion. And no matter what, remember to satiate the demands of your rabid audience or risk cancellation.



Each season is unique based on your chosen cast and the ever-changing audience demands. The longer you manage to keep your show on air, the more questions start to arise. What's up with the cast's dependence on Crush Juice? Where does the Success Slide even go? Clandestine conversations and some good old-fashioned snooping will help you uncover the truth.. providing the Network doesn't get in your way.

Cast For Each Season's Run

Choose between twelve eccentric personalities and find your four-person cast for each season's run. Mix and match conflicting or complementary attractions and watch as tensions run and sparks fly.

Quench Your Audiences' Thirst

Everyone with a television watches The Crush House! From Foodies and Divorced Dads to Butt Guys and... Pharologists...? With dozens of micro-audiences to entertain, you'll have to be strategic to capture them all.

Commercial Breaks Make Cents

Entertainment as good as this isn't free, so set down the camera and pull up some tasteful TV ads now and then to bring the cash. Spend that delicious ad revenue each night on new furnishings for the house to mix things up for the audiences and the cast.

Uncover The Mystery

Explore the house at night while the show's off-air. Break the rules and engage in forbidden conversation with the cast to figure out the dark secrets of The Crush House!



Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Light sexual themes and occasional references to tobacco and alcohol use.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 x64 Bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570T / AMD FX-4350
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon HD 7850
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Low Quality setting, in 720p, producing 30 FPS
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 11 x64 Bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-6950X / AMD Ryzen 7 2700
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 / Radeon RX Vega 56
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: High Quality setting, in 1080p, producing 60 FPS

item.title: VLADiK BRUTAL
item.description:
Title: VLADiK BRUTAL
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual
Developer: Narko Games
Publisher: Narko Games
Release Date: Aug 9, 2024




About This Game


ATTENTION: The game is done by one person, bugs and errors are possible!
All events and heroes are fictional. Any coincidences with reality are random.

-Diverse opponents and allies
-12 types of different weapons
-Original plot
-Proven shooting and killing
-Managed locations with many easter eggs
-Brutal damage system
-Different puzzles and secrets

In a fictional country located in East Europe, a dictator runs the country for many years. Ruler is really paranoid, he did a lot of sweeps and killed people, who were against him. In order to control ordinary people, people were chipped in the neck to track them. All people got the same clothes with a certain number and it all was controlled by the government. But it wasn't enough for the lord, he built a Big Research Centre to strenghten his assassins, but all the dirty work were on prisoners. Country had a lot of prisoners, because a lot of them fought and tried to break dictatorship, somebody got executed, somebody were thrown in jail and expoited as slaves.



Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Blood
Violence
Meat
Dismemberment
Gunfire



System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

Linux

item.title: Supermarket Together
item.description:
Title: Supermarket Together
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation , Free To Play
Developer: DeadDevsTellNoLies
Publisher: DeadDevsTellNoLies
Release Date: Aug 9, 2024




About This Game

Up to 16 players or go solo

Split the action with your friends: the more players in your supermarket, the more demanding customers will become. You can also choose to go solo and inflate the difficulty artificially if you are feeling hard-working.

Unlock franchises and perks in the skills blackboard

Owning a successful supermarket grants Franchise Points: use these to advance in the skills blackboard and add more advantages to your business like unlocking products or improving your employees performance.

Acquire shop space, storage or extra facilities

Expanding public space allows player to offer more and better merchandises. A fully improved store can harbor up to 49,000 products in its shelves.

Do not neglect secondary duties.

Extra activities like cleaning make customers happier. Careful with shoplifters, catching them red handed will prevent finances leaking at the end of the working day.

    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 4 GB available space
    Recommended:

    • Processor: Intel Core i5
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 4 GB available space
